articles.title: Paektusan Secret Camp Meeting Held
articles.content:
Paektusan Secret Camp Meeting Held
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A meeting to vow resolution took place in front of the Paektusan Secret Camp, sacred place of revolution, on Thursday on the occasion of February 16, birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il. 
					 Attending the meeting were Choe Thae Bok, Kim Jong Gak, Kim Ki Nam and Kim Il Chol, leading officials of the party and armed forces organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army, members of the 618 Construction Shock Brigade and working people in Ryanggang Province.
					
					 Made at the meeting were speeches of faith and resolution to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche started on Mt. Paektu under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Choe Thae Bok, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, said the army and people of the DPRK could make steady advance along the road of independence and Songun, blessed with the illustrious leaders generation after generation, and the WPK demonstrate its might as the glorious party of President Kim Il Sung and epochal changes be made in the building of a rich and powerful country, thanks to the birth of Kim Jong Il as the son of the legendary guerillas possessed of the spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He underlined the need for all the party members and other working people to create a new speed of advance of a great surge at every site for an economic power, cherishing the joint calls released by the Central Committee and the Central Military Commission of the WPK on the occasion of its 65th anniversary.
					
					 KPA General Kim Jong Gak, member of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and first deputy director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, stressed that the servicepersons of the KPA will become vanguard fighters of Songun revolution, human bombs and bullets and death defying corps who firmly trust and follow only the Supreme Commander of the KPA and devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution despite whatever storm and stress.
					
					 Ri Yong Chol, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, underlined the need for the young people to make a breakthrough toward charge in the most difficult and labor consuming fields of socialist construction to erect more monumental edifices of eternal value and become young heroes glorifying the era of a great surge.
					
					 Then, poem "Bright Star" written by Kim Il Sung was recited.
					
					 Fireworks of celebrating the February holiday were displayed in the sky above the Paektusan Secret Camp amid high praises of the great man and stormy cheers of all the attendants rocked heaven and earth.

articles.title: Art Groups of Ministries Give Performances
articles.content:
Art Groups of Ministries Give Performances
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Performances were given at the People's Palace of Culture and the Central Youth Hall on Thursday to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il.
					 The performances were enjoyed by senior party and state officials, officials of working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and working people in Pyongyang. 
					
					 The performers enthusiastically sang of the immense joy of significantly celebrating the great auspicious day of the nation and represented the best wishes of all the servicepersons and people for Kim Jong Il in such numbers as narration and chorus of immortal classic masterpiece "O Korea, I Will Add Glory to Thee," narration and chorus "Native Home Covered with Snow", mixed chorus "He Has Loved February of Mt. Paektu" and poem and story-telling "We Will Hold Father Kim Jong Il in Higher Esteem".
					
					 Through poem and story-telling and song "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", "My Country of Radical Changes" and other pieces they enthusiastically sang high praises of the undying feats of
						 Kim Jong Il who has brought about the era of big leaps and demonstrated the dignity and might of Kim Il Sung's nation with tireless leadership holding aloft the great banner of Songun.
					
					 Also put on the stages were numbers vividly depicting the thanks to the benevolent father and reflecting strong spirit of Songun Korea and the ardent enthusiasm of public servants.

articles.title: Unions Hold Celebrations
articles.content:
Unions Hold Celebrations
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Members of the General Federation of Trade Unions, the Union of Agricultural Workers and the Democratic Women's Union of Korea and other working people held celebrations on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and officials concerned. 
					
					 The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Il was born as the son of legendary guerrillas in Mt. Paektu, sacred mountain of the revolution, adding that this was the great fortune of the nation that promised the bright future of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the event of world significance that opened a bright prospect in realizing the human cause of independence.
					
					Kim Jong Il has developed and enriched the revolutionary idea, the Juche idea of President
						 Kim Il Sung with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities, demonstrated the dignity of Juche Korea with his original Songun politics and brought about new history of change for the prosperity of Kim Il Sung's nation to this land, they stressed, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il visited the workers of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex in order to kindle the flame of the New Year's drive and has provided ceaseless field guidance from the outset of this year. Working people across the country have performed miracles and innovation in the struggle for improving the people's standard of living under his leadership. 
					
					 They called upon all the working people to devotedly defend Kim Jong Il and create new norms and records in production and construction in the same work-style and fighting spirit as displayed by workers of the Songjin Steel Complex, regarding their posts as fronts.
					
					 Meanwhile, the workers' art group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea gave a performance at the Central Hall of Workers on the occasion of the February holiday.

articles.title: Chinese Residents Give Concert
articles.content:
Chinese Residents Give Concert
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Chinese residents in Pyongyang Thursday gave a concert at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary
					 Kim Jong Il.
					 Among the audience were Kim Jong Sik, vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee, officials concerned, a vice-chairman and other officials of the Central Committee of the Association of Chinese Residents in Korea and Chinese residents in Pyongyang.
					
					 The performers sang such songs as "His Ideal" and "Sing, Road to Front" reflecting the boundless reverence and trust in Kim Jong Il, the most outstanding veteran statesman and the peerlessly brilliant commander.
					
					 They successfully represented such songs as "Believe Tomorrow" and "Let Us Love Our Country" showing the faith and will of the army and the people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Lao President
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Lao President
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a floral basket by Lao President Choummaly Saynasone who is general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The floral basket was handed to Kim Yong Il, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Chaleune Warinthrasak, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, on Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Palestine Chief
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Palestine Chief
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket from Mahmoud Abbas, Chief of the Palestinian National Authority, on the occasion of his birthday.
					 It was conveyed to Kim Yong Il, department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, by Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, Palestinian ambassador to the DPRK, Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Military Attaches
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Military Attaches
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of his birthday. 
					 They were conveyed to an official concerned by Sun Yanfeng, military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy who is doyen of the corps Thursday.

articles.title: Floral Basket from Chinese
articles.content:
Floral Basket from Chinese
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il Thursday received a floral basket from the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, on the occasion of his birthday.

articles.title: Gifts from Foreigners
articles.content:
Gifts from Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with gifts by personages and companies of Peru, Kuwait and Qatar on the occasion of his birthday, February 16.
					 The gifts were handed to officials concerned of the DPRK active in the relevant countries by Estuardo Martinez Perez, president of the General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute, and other personages of Kuwait and Qatar.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Jong Il received gifts from Kuwaiti companies.

articles.title: Ideological, Theoretical Exploits of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Ideological, Theoretical Exploits of Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean people are recollecting the immortal ideological and theoretical feats of General Secretary Kim Jong Il with his birthday (February 16) approaching.
					 Many years ago he, with a firm determination to develop the revolutionary ideas of President
						 Kim Il Sung as eternal guiding idea of the era of independence, deeply studied the Juche idea while making a profound study and analysis of the previous theories.
					
					 In the 1970s he, confident of the absolute truth of the Juche idea, formulated the President's ideas as an integral system of idea, theory and methodology of Juche and proclaimed the program of modeling the whole society on the Juche idea.
					
					 Since then the Korean people have successfully pushed ahead with the revolution and construction, guided by the great Juche idea.
					
					 Although he was busy with the leadership over the overall affairs of the Party, army and state, he continued energetic ideological and theoretical activities to develop the Juche idea as guiding idea of the era of independence.
					
					 In March Juche 71 (1982) he made public a famous work, "On the Juche Idea," to systemize the President's ideas in a comprehensive way.
					
					 The work elucidates in a scientific and theoretical way the man-centered philosophical outlook on the world, the socio-historical outlook evolved with the popular masses, the maker of history, in the center and the guiding principles of the Juche idea. As soon as the work was published, it evoked a great public response.
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored more works such as "On Some Problems of Education in the Juche Idea" and "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" and further enriched Juche-based theories of socialism.
					
					 In other famous works he advanced in an all-round way the tasks to defend and develop Korean-style socialism based on the scientific guiding idea. Typical of the works are "On Some Problems of the Ideological Foundation of Socialism" and "Socialism Is a Science".
					
					 The ideological and theoretical feats he has made for humankind and history are greatly conducive to the Korean people's effort for building a thriving nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Kuwait
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Observed in Kuwait
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Kuwaiti preparatory committee for commemorating the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association jointly released a bulletin on February 4 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The bulletin in its preface said that it is the faith and will of the army and people of the DPRK to open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012 without fail by following Kim Jong Il's course of the forced march for patriotic devotion.
					
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Single-minded unity of the DPRK and Kim Jong Il" noted that he laid down a unique principle on the socio-political organism for the first time in history and clarified the idea of unity centered on the leader, the top brain of the socio-political community.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's motto of believing in people as in Heaven serves as a fundamental principle to govern the activities of the Workers' Party of Korea and the harmonious whole of the Party and the popular masses has been achieved at the highest level, it said, and continued:
					
					 The DPRK has protected socialism from the imperialist allied forces and brought about a new turning point in building a great prosperous and powerful nation with the strongest weapon called the single-minded unity of the whole society.
					
					 The international community is convinced that the DPRK is sure to emerge an economic power in a few years to come as it surely secured political and ideological foundation and military guarantee for a thriving nation despite the tensest situation and the worst difficulties.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- A lecture took place in the Democratic Republic of Congo, a seminar in the Czech Republic and a film show in Ethiopia from January 31 to February 4 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					The chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of DR Congo said in the lecture that the Juche idea, the Songun idea provides the world progressives with a genuine view of life and guidelines to be firmly adhered to for protecting the sovereignty of a country and national independence from the imperialists' aggression.
					
					 He stressed that pursuant to the Songun politics of Kim Jong Il, the DPRK has dynamically advanced along the road of socialism chosen by itself, undeterred by the U.S. imperialists' ceaseless moves to stifle it and reliably defended peace on the Korean Peninsula and in other regions.
					
					 The deputy editor of the Czech newspaper Dialog in the seminar said progressive mankind is convinced of the future of socialism when witnessing the reality of the DPRK which is winning one victory after another, frustrating the moves of the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces to stifle it.
					
					 After watching Korean films "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Korea Shining with Its Long History" officials of an Ethiopian institution said that they came to know well about what the Juche idea is and the reason why so many people of the world follow the Juche idea.

articles.title: Personal Message from UN Chief
articles.content:
Personal Message from UN Chief
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a verbal personal message and a gift from the secretary general of the UN.
					 They were conveyed to Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, by B. Lynn Pascoe, under-secretary-general of the United Nations for the Department of Political Affairs who is special envoy of its secretary general on a visit to the DPRK, today.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets UN Envoy
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets UN Envoy
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday met and had a talk with B. Lynn Pascoe, under-secretary-general of the United Nations for the Department of Political Affairs who is special envoy of its secretary general, and his party at the Mansudae Assembly Hall when they paid a courtesy call on him. 
					 Present there were Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and Jerome Sauvage, U.N. resident coordinator and resident representative of the UNDP to the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates AU President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates AU President
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Bingu Wa Mutharika, president of Malawi, upon his election as president of the African Union at the 14th ordinary session of the assembly of heads of state and government of the AU.
					 Convinced that the session offered an important occasion for achieving peace, security and political and economic integration of the continent and developing economic field including information and communications technology, Kim reiterated the firm will of the government and people of the DPRK to invariably boost the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation with the AU and its member states. 
					
					Kim sincerely hoped that through his active role the AU would make big success in preventing disputes and conflicts and promoting unity and cooperation among its member states and achieving the integration, peace and economic prosperity of the continent, guided by the spirit in which the AU promulgated 2010 as "year of peace and security of Africa".

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Iranian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Iranian President
Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a message of greetings to Mahmoud Ahmadinejad, President of Iran, on the occasion of the 31st anniversary of the victory of Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, Kim in the message wished the president greater success in his responsible work to defend the sovereignty of the country and achieve the prosperity of the nation.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il Greets Iranian First VP
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Greets Iranian First VP
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Kim Yong Il Thursday sent a message of greetings to First Vice-President of Iran Mohammad-Reza Rahimi on the occasion of the 31st anniversary of the victorious Islamic revolution in Iran.
					 The message expressed belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Iran would grow stronger in political, economic, cultural and other fields, wishing the friendly Iranian people greater progress and prosperity.

articles.title: KFA Chairman Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
articles.content:
KFA Chairman Visits Pyongyang Mission of AINDF
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Alejandro Cao de Benos, chairman of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) headquartered in Spain, and his party Thursday visited the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF). 
					 Chief Jo Il Min and members of the mission greeted the guests and had a talk with them.
					
					 Jo Il Min referred to the reverence for General Secretary Kim Jong Il growing stronger in different parts of south Korea in the run-up to his birthday.
					
					 He informed the KFA chairman of the vigorous movement for independent reunification waged by south Korean people under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Alejandro Cao de Benos said that he would fully support and encourage the struggle of the AINDF and the south Korean people for independence against the U.S. and the country's reunification in the future, too. 
					
					 Then, the guests watched a video showing the personality of Kim Jong Il as a great man.
					
					 A statement in the name of the KFA was issued on the same day. 
					
					 It bitterly denounced the south Korean authorities' frantic racket for confrontation with the DPRK as treacherous, anti-peace and anti-reunification act.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should immediately stop reckless DPRK-targeted war exercises and the racket for confrontation with fellow countrymen if they truly want the improved inter-Korean relations and detente, the statement urged.

articles.title: Direct Rice-sowing Machine Developed
articles.content:
Direct Rice-sowing Machine Developed
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Scientists of the Institute of Agricultural Mechanization of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have developed a direct rice-sowing machine.
					 The machine has already been used in some rural communities including those of Samchon County, South Hwanghae Province, from a few years ago, drawing attention from experts and peasants. 
					
					 Per-hectare yield of rice in basic and sandy fields and reclaimed tideland sowed by the machine showed a more than 20 percent gain.
					
					 It, which can sow seeds in two or three hectares of paddy field a day, has been accepted by many other farms.

articles.title: New Functional Cosmetics Developed
articles.content:
New Functional Cosmetics Developed
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cosmetics Factory has of late developed new kinds of functional cosmetics.
					 Among them are Unhasu-branded cosmetics -- lotion and cream for preventing wrinkles, aloe cream and lotion for keeping or supplementing moisture of skin and whitening cream and ultraviolet-preventing cream for keeping complexion fair.
					
					 It has also made enzymatic, bleaching, fluoric and other dentifrices.
					
					 The cosmetics are popular among people for their helping people improve physiological function of skin and keep themselves healthy and fair.

articles.title: Mass-Production of Vinalon Cotton Hailed
articles.content:
Mass-Production of Vinalon Cotton Hailed
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- Quality vinalon cotton of our own invention and a variety of chemical products are being churned out in an endless stream at the February 8 Vinalon Complex, the leading comprehensive chemical base in the DPRK.
					 This is a historic event that offered an occasion of fresh turn in realizing the intention and decision of the Workers' Party of Korea to open the gate to a thriving nation without fail in 2012 and a powerful demonstration of the stamina of Songun Korea determined to make the country powerful and prosperous which brings all the ideals of the people into full bloom, guided by the Juche idea. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun editorially says this Thursday.
					
					 The start of mass production of vinalon is a great victory of President Kim Il Sung's idea of building Juche-oriented industry, an admirable event that strikingly manifested the heroic spirit of Songun Korea dashing toward the bright future in the spirit of creating everything our own way and a shining success that opened a bright prospect of effecting a radical turn in improving people's standard of living. 
					
					 This laudable success that delighted and excited people across the country is a shining fruition of the tireless thinking and energetic leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, who has devoted his all to translating the noble intention of the President into reality and bringing happiness to the people, and a precious result brought about by the ardent patriotism and loyalty, tremendous mental power and matchless practicability of the workers of the complex who form a harmonious whole with
						 Kim Jong Il.  
					
					 The happy and auspicious event greatly excited the entire army and all the people of the DPRK, convincing them that the victory of a thriving nation is near and encouraging them to work with single mind of patriotic devotion to bring earlier the bright future of rich and prosperous country under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the editorial notes, calling on all the people to advance an all-out charge toward the grand October festival where the fireworks of joy and happiness of the people will be displayed.

articles.title: S. Korea Blamed for Crackdown on Progressive Party
articles.content:
S. Korea Blamed for Crackdown on Progressive Party
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration of south Korea issued a statement on Feb. 7 to denounce the authorities for their crackdown upon the Democratic Labor Party (DLP).
					 The statement recalled that that day the police called out huge repressive forces including at least 750 riot policemen and plainclothes arrest group under the pretext of investigating what they called "suspected political activities" of the Teachers Union and the Government Employees Union to search and confiscate the Internet homepage of the DLP.
					
					 The statement branded this repressive action little different from that during the past dictatorial regime as a premeditated and politically-motivated crackdown perpetrated by the authorities to eliminate in advance the main force of the alliance for an anti-"government" struggle in the run-up to the "elections to the local self-governing bodies".
					
					 No matter how desperately the authorities may work to prolong the remaining days of their dictatorship, the people will certainly judge the present regime and the "Grand National Party" and bring democracy to south Korea, the statement declared.

articles.title: Japan's Liquidation of Past Crimes Urged
articles.content:
Japan's Liquidation of Past Crimes Urged
 Pyongyang, February 11 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity of Saenal Huimang (desire for a new day) and the East Asian History Citizens Network grouping 37 organizations related to history in south Korea called a joint press conference in Seoul on Feb. 7 to protest against the south Korean trip of the king of Japs.
					 At the press conference speakers accused the king of Japs of shamelessly trying to tour south Korea, far from repenting of the crimes committed by Japan in the past and apologizing for them.
					
					 Noting that the south Korean authorities' intention to allow the trip before Japan's proper settlement of its past crimes is little short of shutting their eyes to the Japanese imperialists' colonial domination and plunder, they demanded Japan make an apology and reparation for its past crimes, ban the use of the distorted history textbooks, stop claiming "dominium over Tok Islets" and halt the suppression of Koreans in Japan and discrimination against them, etc.
					
					 They held that the humiliating south Korea-Japan "agreement" signed in 1965 should be renegotiated without fail.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con B. Lynn Pascoe y su comitiva
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje y regalo del secretario general de la ONU
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el mensaje oral y presente que le dirigiera el secretario general de la ONU.
					El subsecretario general de la ONU para los asuntos politicos y enviado especial del secretario general de la ONU, B. Lynn Pascoe, quien esta de visita en Corea, los entrego el dia 11 al presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe mensaje y regalo del secretario general de la ONU
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con B. Lynn Pascoe y su comitiva
 Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 11 en el Palacio de los Congresos Mansudae con el enviado especial del secretario general de la ONU, B. Lynn Pascoe, subsecretario general de las Naciones Unidas para los asuntos politicos, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia y su comitiva. 
					 En la ocasion participaron el vicecanciller coreano Pak Kil Yon y el coordinador permanente de la ONU y representante permanente del Programa de Naciones Unidas para el Desarrollo en Corea, Jerome Sauvage.

articles.title: Actos de organizaciones de masas
articles.content:
Actos de organizaciones de masas
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Tuvieron lugar los actos de la clase obrera y otros miembros sindicales, trabajadores agricolas y las miembros de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea con motivo del dia de nacimiento (16 de febrero) del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					En las ocasiones participaron el secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jung Rin y otros funcionarios correspondientes.
					
					Los oradores senalaron que el Dirigente nacio en el Paektu, sagrado monte de la revolucion como hijo de guerrilla legendaria, lo cual fue una gran fortuna de la nacion que prometio el radiante porvenir de la causa revolucionaria del Juche y un evento historico que dejo abierta la clara perspectiva en la realizacion de la causa de la independencia de la humanidad.
					
					Subrayaron que con sus destacadas actividades ideo-teoricas el Dirigente enriquecio la idea Juche, idea revolucionaria del Presidente Kim Il Sung, exalto con su autoctona politica de Songun a todo el mundo la dignidad de Corea del Juche y creo sobre esta tierra la nueva historia de cambio por la prosperidad eterna de la nacion de Kim Il Sung.
					
					Destacaron que los trabajadores de todos los lugares registran milagros e innovaciones en la lucha por la  mejora de la vida del pueblo bajo la guia del Dirigente quien encendio la llama de las batallas del ano nuevo visitando a finales del ano pasado el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y esta en el camino de visita de orientacion desde principios del ano en curso.
					
					Subrayaron que todos los trabajadores deben defender a costa de la vida al Dirigente y crear nuevas normas y records en la produccion y la construccion con el coraje y el espiritu de lucha del Songgang (Complejo de Acero de Songjin) considerando sus puestos como frentes.
					
					Por otra parte, tuvo lugar en la Casa Central de Obreros la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de los obreros del CC de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea por esa efemeride.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun felicita produccion cuantiosa de vinalon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun felicita produccion cuantiosa de vinalon
Pyongyang, 11 de febrero (ATCC) -- Ahora, en el Complejo de Vinalon 8 de Febrero, una de las grandes bases combinadas de industria quimica de Corea, se producen en avalancha el algodon de vinalon de buena calidad, fibra Juche, y otros productos quimicos de diversos tipos.
					Esto deviene un evento historico que marco un hito para registrar un nuevo viraje en la materializacion del proyecto y la decision del Partido del Trabajo de Corea de abrir a toda costa las puertas a la gran potencia prospera en 2012.
					
					Igualmente, deviene la manifestacion contundente del impetu de la Corea del Songun en prosperidad donde se realizan todos los ideales del pueblo segun la idea Juche.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un editorial difundido este jueves y continua:
					
					 El inicio de la produccion masiva de vinalon significa el gran triunfo de la idea de construccion de la autoctona industria presentada por el Presidente Kim Il Sung, el gran evento que exalto energicamente el impetu heroico de la Corea del Songun que avanza con coraje hacia el luminoso futuro con el modo de creacion a nuestra manera y el gran exito que abrio amplias posibilidades de imprimir un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo.
					
					 Este gran jubilo de hoy, que inunda todo el pais de alegria, deviene el resultado brillante de la incansable reflexion y guia del Dirigente           Kim Jong Il, quien dedica todo lo suyo para realizar el noble deseo del Presidente y hacer feliz al pueblo.
					
					Ademas, constituye el precioso fruto de la ferviente fidelidad patriotica, el indoblegable poderio espiritual y la incomparable capacidad ejecutiva de los obreros productores de vinalon quienes estan unidos monoliticamente en torno al Dirigente.
					
					 Asimismo, hace creer al ejercito y el pueblo de Corea que esta muy cerca la victoria de la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera y les estimula a trabajar con abnegacion patriotica para adelantar el maravilloso futuro de la patria prospera siguiendo la guia del Songun del Dirigente.
					
					 Todos deben avanzar a toda marcha hacia el gran festival de octubre cuando se lanzaran al cielo las salvas prometedoras de la felicidad del pueblo.
